EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-10-9-Reinvent Sweeps (DB Blast).Send
EmailTemplate.subject: [LAST CHANCE] Enter now to win a full conference pass to AWS re:Invent!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-burst-sweepstakes-aws/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloudburst-aws&utm_content=10917]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Don’t miss your chance to enter to win an AWS re:Invent® full conference pass, part of the Turbonomic Cloud Burst Sweepstakes series! The drawing to win the event pass will be held on October 13, 2017.
The Cloud Burst Sweepstakes offers a different prize every month this fall. For the month of October, we are offering an AWS re:Invent® full conference pass. Head out to Las Vegas for five days of innovative breakout sessions, multiple hackathons, and hundreds of more ways to get hands-on experience with AWS experts. Enter now for a chance to win October’s prize and unlock access to our grand prize drawing in November!
<[[https://turbonomic.com/cloud-burst-sweepstakes-aws/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloudburst-aws&utm_content=10917]]>
September 1: Winner Notified
October 13: AWS re:Invent® Full Conference Pass (Nov. 27 – Dec. 1, 2017)
November 3: LOCKED
-The Turbonomic Team
